標題： 【2024 Indigenous Knowledge Public Lecture Series】pinhkngyan: Paths taken to recognising , doing and developing Indigenous methodologies 
日期： Mon, 2 Dec 2024 21:55:44 +0800

Join us as we welcome our honored guests from West Sydney University,Australia.

【2024 Indigenous Knowledge Public Lecture Series】

◎Speaker : Dr. Wasiq Silan 
◎Topic : pinhkngyan: Paths taken to recognising , doing and developing Indigenous methodologies 
◎Date : 3 Dec 2024 10:00-12:00 
◎Location : CIS A222

Speaker : Dr. Wasiq Silan (Assistant Professor, Department of Indigenous Development and Social Work)
Speaker Biography: Dr. Wasiq Silan received her Ph.D. from the University of Helsinki in 2021. Her work engages with Taiwan's social policy and the Tayal elders, grounded in interpretive policy analysis and critical ethnography while drawing from Indigenous methodologies. She firmly believe that doing Indigenous methodologies heal self-doubt and colonial wounds.
